column5: - a big beautiful fish put through the ringer.   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wz66LNKrUPk

That is awful... they musky fish without a net and then throw it on the bottom of the boat, and to controll it try to step on the poor thing... if you dont have a net for em and risk dropping it its better to take the hooks out in the water and just let it go, or take a pic while its in the water
Yes thats a bad job.all the protective slime was rubbed off not to mention kept out of the water too long,why wouldnt he have a net????do you think that fish survived   thanks for sharing
What an idiot!!!... Don't they know that's what gaffs are for???
if you look on the side, these guys got a few more videos.
Could he just stop sliding the poor muskie on the boat deck like mopping floor.....Any kind of fish should be slided like that ><
Woulda liked to see it swim away,,if it did!
sad to say, but i thought it would have been nice to see a set of trebbles in his hands after that performance
no respect for apex predators . Criminal

This showed up on the board a few months ago. Don't everyone go getting your knickers in a knot. Think of it as educational. Everything is good for something. Even the town drunk can be used as a bad example for others.
FYI, my knickers STAY inna wad!
